lst.name: sentence
lst.str: An official newspaper said earlier this year that over 40 pct of the country's sugar mills were losing money, or had closed because the price of sugar had not changed for 20 years, while the production costs have risen sharply over the same period.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "A major review of all economic reforms is under way, the biggest since the reforms began in 1979, because many things are not going well -- a large budget deficit, too rapid price increases and no major improvement in productivity of state firms," the Chinese journalist said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Said a foreign lawyer, referring to the crisis sparked by student demonstrations which led to Hu's replacement, "The leadership here is a self-perpetuating oligarchy.
